item.title: Moving Forward
item.description:
Moving Forward by President Russell M. Nelson, President of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints given in the Saturday Morning session of the 190th Semiannual General Conference on Wed Sep 30 2020
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
item.itunes:author: President Russell M. Nelson, President of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints
